desc: Hype Performance Group and its lead developer, David Amenta, create high quality custom aircraft for Microsoft Flight Simulator. The Airbus H135 helicopter was the first of its kind in Microsoft Flight Simulator and Hype Performance Group's Icon A5 2021 Performance Edition is another well known aircraft by the team.

layout.text: Bambi bucket simulation with functional pick up and drop. Functional hoist with multiple interactive animations, mechanical system management and the ability drop and collect the crew. Helionix integration as well as a friendly user interface added to the tablet to operate the new capabilities. Switches and panels have been added to the Overhead Panel and Center Console to allow new capabilities and much, much more!
